name: Spark of Life Demo
description:
For my game, I made a 2d shooter/platformer where the player character must manuever  around enemies with a dash and a double jump.

1. I made every sprite asset on piskel, including the player character, the enemies, and the surroundings

2. the game has sound effects and music that I got from freesound.com

3. the player characters and enemies are all uniquely scripted, and served as good coding practice for me.
